title: Watching them write, seeing them learn: a kindergarten writing community at work
creator_credit: Brian Butler and Riverina College of Advanced Education. Literacy Centre
brief_description: Kindergarten children experiment with written language. There are no formal writing lessons and they are left free to learn by trial and error. Narrated by Barbara Kamler.
